did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Research materials, writings, correspondence, administrative files, tape recordings, audio cassettes, video cassettes, and photographs
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Subject files containing research materials, writings, correspondence, and administrative files. There are also tape recordings, audio cassettes, and video cassettes of radio and television broadcasts, and photographs (primarily from Latin America). Subjects include public opinion, mass media, measurement of attitudes and values, economic development (Latin America), and social science methodology.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Subject files containing research materials, writings, correspondence, and administrative files. There are also tape recordings, audio cassettes, and video cassettes of radio and television broadcasts, and photographs (primarily from Latin America). Subjects include public opinion, mass media, measurement of attitudes and values, economic development (Latin America), and social science methodology.
Also, photocopy transcripts of 11 broadcasts on sociology over Ithaca, New York radio stations, February to May, 1974.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Rose Goldsen papers, #14-25-1649. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
